## Restock Recommendation

| Parameter                         | Value                                     |
|-----------------------------------|-------------------------------------------|
| Recommended Order Size            | 30,000 units                              |
| Rationale                         | To cover forecasted demand with a safety buffer and leverage the available vendor order quantity. |
| Comparison with Player's Plan     | 2,000 units more than the player's plan.  |
| Estimated Stock Turnover Days     | ~2.5 days                                 |
| Forecasted Demand Coverage Days   | ~5.5 days                                 |
| Comments                          | Ordering 30,000 units provides a safety buffer against demand variability, ensuring sufficient stock for the next 5 days and beyond. Ordering in multiples of 3,000 units allows for greater flexibility in meeting demand.  |
